long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Supercharge Your Facebook Network with Bulk Friend Requests

Grow your Facebook connections effortlessly with our powerful browser extension. Designed for efficient bulk friend requests, our tool helps you expand your social network with ease and precision.

🚀 Key Features:
✓ Bulk Friend Requests: Send multiple requests in one click
✓ Smart Filtering: Target ideal profiles using advanced criteria
✓ Customizable Intervals: Ensure smooth, safe request sending
✓ Request Management: Easily cancel or track sent requests
✓ Insightful Analytics: Monitor your networking progress
✓ Secure Data Handling: Backup and import data risk-free
✓ Versatile User Addition: Add via ID, URL, or CSV/Excel files

# Why Choose Our Extension:
⏱️ Time-Saving: Automate friend requests to grow your network faster
🖱️ User-Friendly: Intuitive interface for effortless navigation
🔧 Customizable: Tailor settings to your networking strategy
🔒 Safe & Secure: Your data stays on your device, ensuring privacy
📈 Productivity Boost: Streamline your FB networking efforts

# Perfect for:
👥  Social media enthusiasts
💼 Business networkers
🌐 Community builders
🔍 Anyone looking to expand their FB connections

📃 Get Started:
1. Install the extension
2. Set your preferences
3. Start growing your network!

📬 FAQ
If it keeps failing, please send us the corresponding screenshot, and we will do some troubleshooting and compatibility.

🔐 Data Privacy
Your data's security is our top priority. Rest assured, all data remains on your device, ensuring 100% privacy and trustworthiness.

⭐ About Pro
Friend Requests Sender is a paid extension, you can get basic functionality and upgrade to get more functionality.
